movie_title: Discoveries of the deep sea - 6 Minute English
introduction: A thriving ecosystem has been discovered in the last few decades in a region which was previously th

vocabulary.definition: a deep or seemingly bottomless chasm
vocabulary.example: The ocean abyss is a mysterious and unexplored part of the Earth.

vocabulary.definition: relating to or denoting the action of heated water in the earth's crust
vocabulary.example: Hydrothermal vents are fascinating ecosystems found deep in the ocean.

vocabulary.definition: something that is extremely hard to find
vocabulary.example: Finding a specific fish in the vast ocean is like searching for a needle in a haystack.

vocabulary.definition: existing or available in large quantities; plentiful
vocabulary.example: The hydrothermal vents are home to abundant life forms.

vocabulary.definition: to investigate or begin to understand something in a superficial or preliminary way
vocabulary.example: Scientists have only scratched the surface of deep sea exploration.

vocabulary.definition: of very great extent or quantity; immense
vocabulary.example: The ocean is a vast body of water covering most of the Earth's surface.
